info.title: Context Store API
info.description: API for managing threads and messages

parameters.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve messages from.
parameters.name: threadId

parameters.description: Number of messages to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Sort order by the `created_at` timestamp of the objects. `asc` for ascending order and `desc` for descending order.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `after` is a message ID defining the start of the page.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `before` is a message ID defining the end of the page.
parameters.name: before

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of messages in a specific thread

parameters.description: The ID of the thread to create the message in.
parameters.name: threadId

post.description: Creates new messages in a specified thread with the provided content and metadata.

schema.description: An array of message objects to create. Each message object must include a `role` and `content` property.

role.description: The role of the message sender (function, user, system, assistant, data, tool).

content.description: The content of the message. Can be any valid JSON value (string, object, array, etc.).

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the message. Can be any valid JSON value.

schema.description: An array of message objects to create. Each message object must include a `role` and `content` property.

role.description: The role of the message sender (function, user, system, assistant, data, tool).

content.description: The content of the message. Can be any valid JSON value (string, object, array, etc.).

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the message. Can be any valid JSON value.

schema.description: An array of message objects to create. Each message object must include a `role` and `content` property.

role.description: The role of the message sender (function, user, system, assistant, data, tool).

content.description: The content of the message. Can be any valid JSON value (string, object, array, etc.).

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the message. Can be any valid JSON value.

parameters.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve messages from.
parameters.name: threadId

parameters.description: The ID of the message to retrieve.
parameters.name: messageId

get.description: Retrieves a specific message from a thread by its ID. Returns a 404 error if the message is not found.

parameters.description: The ID of the thread containing the message.
parameters.name: threadId

parameters.description: The ID of the message to update.
parameters.name: messageId

patch.description: Updates the content and/or metadata of an existing message. Only the provided fields will be updated.

content.description: New content to update the message with. Can be any valid JSON value.

metadata.description: New metadata to update the message with. Can be any valid JSON value.

content.description: New content to update the message with. Can be any valid JSON value.

metadata.description: New metadata to update the message with. Can be any valid JSON value.

content.description: New content to update the message with. Can be any valid JSON value.

metadata.description: New metadata to update the message with. Can be any valid JSON value.

parameters.description: The ID of the thread containing the message to delete.
parameters.name: threadId

parameters.description: The ID of the message to delete.
parameters.name: messageId

delete.description: Permanently deletes a message from a thread. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.
parameters.name: threadId

parameters.description: Whether to include the most recent messages in the response.
parameters.name: includeMessages

get.description: Retrieves a thread by ID, optionally including its most recent messages.

parameters.description: The ID of the thread to update.
parameters.name: threadId

patch.description: Updates a thread's title or metadata. Only the provided fields will be updated.

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the thread. Can be any valid JSON value.
Optional metadata associated with the thread. Can be any valid JSON value.
Optional metadata associated with the thread. Can be any valid JSON value.

parameters.description: The ID of the thread to delete.
parameters.name: threadId

delete.description: Permanently deletes a thread and all its associated messages. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.description: Number of threads to return. Defaults to 50.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Sort order by creation timestamp. 'asc' for ascending order and 'desc' for descending order.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: A cursor for pagination. Returns threads created before this timestamp.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: A cursor for pagination. Returns threads created after this timestamp.
parameters.name: after

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of threads with their message counts.

post.description: Creates a new thread with the provided title and metadata.

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the thread. Can be any valid JSON value.
Optional metadata associated with the thread. Can be any valid JSON value.
Optional metadata associated with the thread. Can be any valid JSON value.
